summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2747, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue South from Holgate Street to Charlestown Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of an asphalt top upon the existing bridge roadway, and including the relaying and repairing of such of the existing planking and sub-structure as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 32730 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
